title: “I don’t want it to be easy” and other objections to using AI
content: In September I took part in a panel at the African Journalism Education Network conference. The most interesting moment came when members of the audience were asked if they didn’t use AI — and why.

title: Double counting: how to spot it and how to avoid it
content:
Double counting — counting something more than once in data — can present particular risks for journalists, leading to an incorrect total or proportion. Here’s how to spot it — and what to do about it.

Look at the following chart showing the gender of teachers in UK schools, based on data on teacher headcounts. Notice anything wrong? (There are at least two problems)...

title: 7 técnicas de design de prompts para IA generativa que todo jornalista deveria conhecer
content: <html><head></head><body><h4 class="wp-block-heading">Ferramentas como o ChatGPT podem parecer falar a sua língua, mas, na verdade, falam uma linguagem de probabilidade e suposições fundamentadas. Você pode fazer-se entender melhor — e obter resultados mais profissionais — com algumas técnicas simples de prompting.
